description:
Saito Tatsuoki joins forces with the Miyoshi Three and builds a fort near Ishiyama Hongan-ji to plan his next battle with Nobunaga. Shimotsuma arrives at the fort to complain on behalf of Ishiyama Hongan-ji, but Tatsuoki had a plan...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Tatsuoki Always Appears Right Around the Time You Forget About Him
Tatsuoki wa Wasureta Koro ni Yatte Kuru
龍興は忘れた頃にやってくる
